channel.title: STR bouns like rs (rep++) if you help <---
channel.description: does anybody have a code or someting that i can put in? or a tut for str bouns like rs to go into my sever? -thanks.

item.title: STR bouns like rs (rep++) if you help <---
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, there may be a program a little like Remote Assistance on MSN, but I really don’t know one.

Also, if you search Google or another site under a configuration section, you may find an item.cfg with almost exact item bonuses. I think I have seen 1-3 of them before.

Read full topic
item.source: STR bouns like rs (rep++) if you help <---

so i dont have to keep sending it back and forth.
like i send it to him once. and he can run the sever or end it.
and when he runs or i run the sever. it will say who connected etc. you know what i mean?[/quote]

yuo cant give rep

item.title: STR bouns like rs (rep++) if you help <---
item.dc:creator: @David_L_F David_L_F
item.description:
@David_L_F wrote:

I’m not too sure about the whole having a coder thing, I’ve never done it. But if I do, I’d probably make a folder for the server, zip that folder with WinRAR or WinZip and upload it to a file-sharing site.

If you’re hosting the server, just have him send the files he changed back to you. Compile. Then run.

Read full topic

Search your object ID (the one you wish to change the strength bonus of,) and edit it.
